titles.title: Medicare Patient Access to Hospice Act of 2015
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for recognition of attending physician assistants as attending physicians to serve hospice patients, and for other purposes.
Medicare Patient Access to Hospice Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Medicare Patient Access to Hospice Act of 2015
Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to recognize attending physician assistants as attending physicians to serve hospice patients.
